recipe_name: Citrus sizzler frisée - lettuce, watercress, cucumber and orange segments
author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Toss salad ingredients together and fill roll.  Add dressing.
ingredients: 4 frisée lettuce leaves,  2.5cm/1in piece of cucumber, sliced,  4-5 orange segments,  mayonnaise (check it uses free range eggs or is egg free) or a drizzle of,  sesame oil
